Room.Name: Brownhaven Way
Room.ShortDescription: Brownhaven Way continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Several small but expensive shops can be seen along here. Directly to the west is a custom leather armor shop. Frebadis, the old hobbit who runs the shop brags that his great, great grandfater established the place when Brownhaven was just a wide spot in the road to Oceancrest. On the east is a custom knife shop where you can buy a knife of any size. For a little extra, you can even get it enchanted.
